description: This data was generated from the TCGA Annotations table, obtained from the TCGA DCC in July 2016. More details: The TCGA annotations table is no longer available but documentation describing the annotations is available on the NCI wiki: https://wiki.nci.nih.gov/display/TCGA/Introduction+to+Annotations. The contents of this table were downloaded shortly before the TCGA DCC went off-line. Please refer to the Genomic Data Commons Data Portal (https://gdc-portal.nci.nih.gov/) as the new data source for TCGA data (including annotations).

fields.description: Each annotation was assigned a unique (integer) identifier. Examples: 711, 2908, 15110
fields.name: annotationId

fields.description: An integer value - 38 possibilities in the rangefrom 1 to 465. There are 38 different annotation categories, each of which has a unique (integer) identifier.
fields.name: annotationCategoryId

fields.description: Each of the 38 annotation categories also has a name associated with it. Examples: Tumor type incorrect, Normal class but appears diseased,Duplicate case,Prior malignancy, etc
fields.name: annotationCategoryName

fields.description: Each annotation gets one of four possible classifications:Notification, CenterNotification, Observation, and Redaction
fields.name: annotationClassification

fields.description: An arbitrary note associated with each annotation. (This is required for each annotation. ) Examples: Tumor tissue submitted was a benign myometrium/endometrium sample, [intgen.org]: Case was of non-ovarian origin.
fields.name: annotationNoteText

fields.description: TCGA study abbreviation, eg LAML. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-TCGA-users/TCGA-code-tables/TCGA-study-abbreviations
fields.name: Study

fields.description: Each annotation is for a specific TCGA item, and this field specifies what the *type* of item it is -- ie, a Shipped Portion, Aliquot, Patient, Analyte, Slide, Sample, or Portion. For more details, refer to the TCGA Encyclopedia at https://wiki.nci.nih.gov/display/TCGA/TCGA+Encyclopedia
fields.name: itemTypeName

fields.description: Each annotation is for a specific TCGA item, and this field specifies the barcode of that item. Examples:TCGA-01-0629,TCGA-EM-A2CS-01A-11D-A17V--08
fields.name: itemBarcode

fields.description: TCGA barcode identifier for the study participant, eg TCGA-02-0001
fields.name: ParticipantBarcode

fields.description: TCGA sample barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries
fields.name: SampleBarcode

fields.description: The Date that this annotation was added to the annotation database. Example: 2011-06-17T16:27:55-04:00
fields.name: dateAdded

fields.description: The Date that this annotation was first created. Example:2013-01-21T15:21:06-05:00
fields.name: dateCreated

fields.description: The Date that this annotation was last edited. Example:2013-01-21T15:21:06-05:00
fields.name: dateEdited
